New_York.Chambers Street\u2013World Trade Center/:
Chambers Street–World Trade Center/Park Place is a New York City Subway station complex on the IND Eighth Avenue Line and IRT Broadway–Seventh Avenue Line. Located on Church Street between Chambers and Vesey Streets in Lower Manhattan, it is served by the:
A and E trains at all times
2 train on weekdays
3 train at all times except late nights and weekends
C train at all times except late nights
The station also connects to the PATH via the World Trade Center Transportation Hub and the BMT Broadway Line at Cortlandt Street. These connections link this station with the nearby Fulton Center, via the out-of-fare-control Dey Street Passageway.
